text.div:
COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Chronic Respiratory Failure

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    Code Display
    J96.1 Chronic respiratory failure
    J96.10 Chronic respiratory failure, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia
    J96.11 Chronic respiratory failure with hypoxia
    J96.12 Chronic respiratory failure with hypercapnia
    J96.2 Acute and chronic respiratory failure
    J96.20 Acute and chronic respiratory failure, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia
    J96.21 Acute and chronic respiratory failure with hypoxia
    J96.22 Acute and chronic respiratory failure with hypercapnia

name: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Chronic Respiratory Failure

concept.display: Chronic respiratory failure, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia
Acute and chronic respiratory failure, unspecified whether with hypoxia or hypercapnia
Acute and chronic respiratory failure with hypoxia
Acute and chronic respiratory failure with hypercapnia
